# ada-badge

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                  | Type                                                                                      | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `text` _(required)_ | `text`    | It defines text of the badge | `string`                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `variant`           | `variant` | It defines type of the badge | `"alternative" \| "default" \| "error" \| "info" \| "inverted" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `"default"` |
